posts.body:
With the latest update you can no longer expand images in their post, all you can do is make them take control of your entire screen and fullscreen

Is there a way to bring back the old behavior? or give it a toggle or something on the options panel.

>>fcd0a3c7-acf7-4148-8403-eed72a0500b1
okay.. this was fixed already, maybe it was a mistake?
